app.title: Lunar Beauty Calendar
app.subtitle: Beauty advice based on moon phases

phaseExplanations.NEW: During the new moon, energy is directed inward. It's the ideal time for purification and new beginnings.
phaseExplanations.WAXING_CRESCENT: The waxing crescent brings growth and development energy. Perfect for nourishing and stimulating.
phaseExplanations.FIRST_QUARTER: The first quarter is a time of action and decisions. Energy is strong and dynamic.
phaseExplanations.WAXING_GIBBOUS: The waxing gibbous moon amplifies effects. It's the time of maximum power for treatments.
phaseExplanations.FULL: The full moon brings intense energy but can cause sensitivity. Ideal for relaxation and care.
phaseExplanations.WANING_GIBBOUS: The waning gibbous moon favors release and repair of damage.
phaseExplanations.LAST_QUARTER: The last quarter is perfect for eliminating what's no longer needed, like unwanted hair.
phaseExplanations.WANING_CRESCENT: The waning crescent concludes the cycle. It's time for deep cleaning and reset.
